name: Procreate Import
description:
Import your .procreate files into Figma, complete with named layers, groups, blend modes, and clipping masks.


Supported:

  • Clipping masks
  • Background color
  • sRGB color space
  • Blend modes
  • File and layer names
  • Import size options
  • Procreate groups
  • Import of all layers (or option to flatten on import)


Not supported (yet):

  • Text layers (rasterize in Procreate to import)
  • GIF import
  • P3 color space (results will vary)
